translation.jumbatecSolutions: At Jumbatec, we provide customized technological solutions to help our clients achieve their business goals.
translation.platformDescription: The Student Management System is a system developed by JUMBATEC that aims to help educational institutions streamline their management.
translation.paymentReminderMessages: Real-time Tuition and Fee Payment Control
translation.customSoftwareDescription: We develop customized software to meet the specific needs of each client using the latest technologies.
translation.fintechDescription: We provide technological financial solutions that help businesses innovate and improve their services, including management for microloans and integration with mobile services.
translation.websiteDescription: We create responsive and professional websites, as well as set up corporate emails for efficient communication.
translation.digitalMarketingDescription: We develop integrated digital marketing strategies with artificial intelligence to increase online visibility and attract more customers.
translation.itConsultingDescription: We offer specialized IT consulting to improve processes and implement new technological solutions.
translation.aiSolutionsDescription: We develop AI-based solutions that automate processes and improve operational efficiency.
translation.servicesDescription: At JUMBATEC, we offer innovative and customized technological solutions to boost your business.
translation.responsiveWebsitesDescription: We develop responsive and professional websites for your business, as well as set up corporate emails for efficient communication.
translation.aboutUsDescription: JUMBATEC is a leading company in innovative technological solutions, dedicated to transforming businesses through technology. With a qualified and experienced team, we develop modern and efficient management systems that meet the specific needs of each client, always focusing on quality, innovation, and excellence in service.

footer.idealWorldText: In an ideal world, this text wouldn't exist. A customer would recognize the importance of having text on the web before the design starts.

translation.title: Revolutionize Your Financial Services with Our Fintech Solution!
translation.description: Unlock the future of finance with a flexible, secure, and scalable platform designed to meet the needs of microfinance institutions, credit unions, and SMEs.

features2.0: Manage loans, payments, and customer accounts with ease
features2.1: Seamless mobile money and payment gateway integration
features2.2: Customizable to fit your business model and needs
features2.3: Cloud-based and fully scalable for growth

translation.functions: Among various functionalities, the following stand out:
translation.notifications: Sending Notifications via SMS and WhatsApp
translation.benefitsDesc: Centralized data stored securely and accessible whenever needed. Reminders to students and guardians about tuition and fee payments; Interaction between the student or guardians and the institution through a simplified channel like WhatsApp. Access data anywhere and anytime. In case of equipment theft, fire, or other natural calamities, there is no loss of information.
translation.targetDesc: Universities, Higher Institutes, Training Institutes, Colleges, Primary and Secondary Schools, Childcare Centers, and Boarding Schools
